text: Charles Leonard Long was an Massachusetts lawyer, judge and politician who served as the Mayor of Springfield, Massachusetts in 1895. ==Early life== Long was born in Lowell, Massachusetts on September 16, 1851. ==Notes== Category:1851 births Category:1929 deaths Category:Harvard Law School alumni Category:Massachusetts lawyers Category:People from Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Massachusetts city council members Category:Mayors of Springfield, Massachusetts Category:Massachusetts Republicans Category:19th-century American politicians
title: Charles L. Long
